# Simple Numeric Questions Web Page

This project is a simple HTML, CSS, and JavaScript web page featuring:
- A button to generate random numeric questions
- A button to reveal the answer to the current question

## Tech Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3
- Vanilla JavaScript

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file
- `styles.css` - Styling
- `script.js` - Question generation and answer logic
